document_data.caption: A map showing Whaelgond Way and surroundings in the North Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Whaelgond Way
document_data.mainbody: '''Whaelgond Way''' was a large road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Whaelgond Way was located in the north and central sections of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]]. It stretched through much of the North Ward, orginating in the north on [[Immar Street]] and passing southeast then due south to eventually end on [[Suldown Street]]. Along its path Whaelgond Way was intersected by [[Sashtar Street]], [[Tower March]], [[Horn Street]], [[Saerdoun Street]], [[Delzorin Street]], [[Sulmor Street]], [[Hassantyr's Street]], the [[Street of the Manticore]], and [[Tarsar's Street]].
